ch.rs.reflectorgrid.util

Class ReflectionNodeCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.rs.reflectorgrid.util.ReflectionNodeCollection

  • public class ReflectionNodeCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    This "Collection" contains different functions to create Nodes that are connected to a Field and contains the needed Listeners for changes in the node. Created by Ricardo on 15.11.2017.

      • createSpinner

        public static javafx.scene.control.Spinner createSpinner(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                                         java.lang.Object handle,
                                                         java.lang.Object masterObject)
        This Functions creates a Spinner with the NumberSpinnerValueFactory so that it can fit any Numeric field.
        Parameters:
        field - The field itself that gets connected to the spinner
        handle - the object in which the field is connected
        masterObject - the masterObject of the field
        Returns:
        a Spinner with the NumberSpinnerValueFactory built in aswell as all needed Listeners.
